Literature.Title: The effect of glycine replacement with flexible ω-amino acids on the antimicrobial and haemolytic activity of an amphipathic cyclic heptapeptide.
Literature.Author: Oddo A, Nyberg NT, Frimodt-Møller N, Thulstrup PW, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=28 µM,Human erythrocytes:99% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Candida albicans ATCC 200955(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=64µM)
